
For more information on these settings see instructions in the [getting_started.md](./getting_started.md).

### Setting up this repository:

- [ ] Repository is created and set to `private`.

 - [ ] `main` branch has been set up:
   - [ ] `Require pull request reviews before merging` box is checked.
   - [ ] `Require status checks to pass before merging` box is checked.
     - [ ] Underneath that `Require branches to be up to date before merging` box is checked.

 - [ ] [This course's _Bookdown repository has been linked in the GitHub actions](https://github.com/ottrproject/OTTR_Template/wiki/Publishing-on-Leanpub#linking-to-your-_bookdown-github-repository)

 - [ ] [This course's Leanpub has been set up](https://github.com/ottrproject/OTTR_Template/wiki/Publishing-on-Leanpub#hosting-your-course-on-leanpub)

- [ ] This repo has been enrolled in [automatic updates from the original template](https://github.com/ottrproject/OTTR_Template/wiki/Receiving-template-updates).
